resources.string:
You're healthy now! 

To stay healthy in the future,

- Avoid consuming too much energy.
- Avoid eating too many carbohydrates and saturated fatty acids.
- Eat plenty of unsaturated fatty acid-rich fish and fiber-rich vegetables.

You're in danger now!

To be healthy,

- Avoid consuming too much energy.
- Avoid eating too many carbohydrates and saturated fatty acids.
- Eat plenty of unsaturated fatty acid-rich fish and fiber-rich vegetables.
